opportunitiesData.title: 16--BODY,VALVE
opportunitiesData.fullParentPathName: DEPT OF DEFENSE.DEFENSE LOGISTICS AGENCY (DLA).DLA AVIATION.DLA AV RICHMOND.DLA AVIATION

description:
The Air Force intends to solicit and award a firm fixed price, sole source purchase order to Blade Diagnostics Corporation (Pittsburgh, PA; CAGE Code 332B2), under the authority of AFFARS 5313.501 (10 U.S.C. 2302b), for the PM/RM Services on the SmartBlend System for the Oklahoma City Air Logistics Complex (OC-ALC) for the period of 14 June 2022 – 13 June 2027.

The NAICS code for this requirement is 811219 with a size standard of $22M.

Contractor registration – which results in receiving a unique, active CAGE Code – in the System for Award Management (SAM) is required prior to receiving any contracts or orders from the Government.  Contractors can register electronically at https://sam.gov/content/home. 

Interested persons may identify their interest and capability to respond to the requirement by submitting a quote and information.  Electronic procedures will be used for this solicitation through Beta SAM at https://www.beta.sam.gov/.  No telephone requests.
